description: The Begonia 'Martha Stewart' is a beautiful, easy-to-care for option for any garden. It features colorful leaves with yellow and green variegation, as well as spectacular blooms in shades of pink and white. Consequently, it adds a unique and uplifting ambience to the entire space. It is also fairly tolerant of dry air and doesn't require a lot of water, which makes it an ideal choice for those with busy lifestyles. Additionally, it grows best in partial shade and only needs to be pruned occasionally making it a low-maintenance option. With its unique charm and easy-care routine, the Begonia 'Martha Stewart' will definitely bring beauty and life to any garden.
